amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used by the National Labor Relations Board to exert jurisdiction over any organization or enterprise pursuant to the standard adopted by the National Labor Relations Board in San Manuel Indian Bingo and Casino and Hotel Employees & Restaurant Employees International Union, AFL-CIO, CLC and Communication Workers of America, AFL-CIO, CLC, Party in Interest, and State of Connecticut, Intervenor, 341 NLRB No. 138 (May 28, 2004).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enforce a National Labor Relations Board decision dealing with jurisdiction over Indian tribes.
